wikipedia_page.main: Mick Hayde (born 20 June 1971) is an English footballer, who played as a full back in the Football League for Chester City.

response: A Midfielder, Senior made one Football League appearance in his career when he came on for Chester City (where he was an apprentice) in a 1–0 defeat at Mansfield Town on 20 January 1990.Sumner (1997), stats section (89-90) He was one of three youngsters during the season to make a solitary substitute appearance for Chester, along with Mick Hayde and Derek Nassari.
